title: Developer Documentation Portal
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want a comprehensive online documentation portal so that I can easily access up-to-date information on API usage, integration guidelines, and best practices for application development.

title: Sandbox Environment for Testing
summary: As a developer, I want a sandbox environment where I can test my applications without affecting live user data or system performance so that I can ensure my applications work correctly and securely before deployment.

title: Data Privacy Compliance Support
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want clear guidelines and tools for data privacy and security so that I can ensure my applications comply with regulations and protect users' personal information.

title: Integration with Third-Party Services
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate third-party services into the ALFRED system so that I can enhance functionalities and provide users with additional features.

title: Community Collaboration
summary: As a full-stack developer creating healthcare applications, I want a community forum to share experiences and collaborate on application development so that I can enhance my projects with insights from peers and receive timely support.

title: API Rate Limiting and Quotas
summary: As a developer, I want to have clear information about API usage limits so that I can manage my application's performance and ensure fair access to the system.

title: User Consent Management
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want an API to manage user consent for data sharing and privacy settings so that I can ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and maintain user trust.
